thread.section_title: The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great find! Great staff!
thread.title_full: Great find! Great staff! - Review of The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Joe W
title: Great find! Great staff!
text:
Really cool hotel near Grand Central Station. We even had a view of Empire State Bldg. Super friendly staff, Nick the Bellman took care of us both checking in & leaving. Gary was great at the front desk and was great with directions.
The bar/restaurant attached was awesome. Great bkfst too!
